English.Text: "Your helmsmanship is most impressive!" the Queen calls down to you, as you bring the modest sailing ship you have borrowed neatly alongside her flagship."Meet me tomorrow at the Cape of Trelawney!" You find your own ship at the marina, and sail to Trelawney, southernmost point of the Old World. It was not fifteen years previous, that a great naval victory was won here over La Corona by one Admiral Nadasky.The Lap of Victory is there waiting for you, and the Queen receives you warmly aboard. You are finally able to ask why it is she has run away.
